TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Add Affiliations to Persons, Organisations and Facilities.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. To verify basic functionality for Affiliation: adding affiliations to Organisations, Persons and Facilities.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Two nations are exchanging information between their C2IS's. Nation A will add Affiliations (a 'Person' element) to an organisation, a person, or a facility.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation B has a subscription to receive information from the 'Ground Picture > Forces' and the 'Ground Picture > Infrastructure and Environment' Topics of Nation A. A 'Friend' (HostilityStatusCode) Organisation, and a Person BSO exist in the 'Forces' topic, and a 'Hostile' Facility exists in the 'Infrastructure and Environment' topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: Nation B receives information about Affiliation added by Nation A. The information is correctly processed (and displayed) in the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds the GeopoliticalAffiliation 'Canada' to an existing organisation in the 'Forces' Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The GeopoliticalAffiliation is created; Nation B receives the new Affiliation information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds the EthnicAffiliation 'Iranian/Persian' to an existing hostile facility (e.g. a Building) in the 'Infrastructure and Environment' topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The EthnicAffiliation is created; Nation B receives the new affiliation information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds a GeopoliticalAffiliation to an existing Person BSO in the 'Forces' Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The GeopoliticalAffiliation is created; Nation B receives the new affiliation information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds a ReligiousAffiliation to the person BSO used in Step 3.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The ReligiousAffiliation is created; Nation B receives the new affiliation information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A adds the EthnicAffiliation 'Iranian/Persian' to the person BSO used in Step 3.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The EthnicAffiliation is created; Nation B receives the new affiliation information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A changes the EthnicAffiliation created in Step 5 to 'Iraqi'.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The EthnicAffiliation is changed; Nation B receives the updated information. The same information is shared by the C2IS's of both nations.
